title: Brand New Modern House for Sale.
details:
A Brand New Modern house for sale in the heart of Negombo city located in a highly residential area and in Close proximity to leading Schools,Banks ,Supermarkets and Hospitals.

Less than 75m to Colombo - Negombo Main Road & 20 Foot , Dead end Road Access to the house.

10 perch Land with Living , Dinning , Pantry , Wet Kitchen,3 Bedrooms and 3 Bathrooms with 2 Bedrooms with attached bathrooms.

House completed to the highest standard with Modern Pantry Cupboards ,Toilet Fittings (American Standard),Taps (Grohe) and Universal Dual power sockets ( capable of handing square and round plugs without Multi Socket).

High Quality Aluminum Windows by Alumex.

Italian made tiles used for flooring and Kumbuk Wood flooring used for staircase and Attique.

Separate Office/Study Attique a level up from upstairs.

Separate Maids Room and Bathroom.

Equipped with Roller Gates .
